briefTitle: Use of a Remifentanil-propofol Mixture in Patients Undergoing Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Use of a Remifentanil-propofol Mixture in Patients With Breast Cancer Undergoing Breast Cancer Surgery: a Prospective Pilot Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ASA II or III
* age more than 18 years
* scheduled for breast cancer surgery under general anesthesia.

Exclusion Criteria:

* previously allergic to propofol or remifentanil
* combining other surgical procedure leading to extended operative time
